parameters: \n<Bartender>\autoevent[3]Chào buổi tối! Cậu muốn ăn nhẹ
\n<Bartender>\autoevent[3]Bạn cần lấy ai đó từ trên
vé xem? Cô ấy có quyền lấy tất cả công cụ.
\n<Bartender>\autoevent[3]Cậu muốn bia cho cậu và bạn bè?
\n<Bartender>\autoevent[3]Của cậu đây, 1 ly pha thủ công và
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]Can you go buy us some drinks?
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]I can’t lose that money! Go catch it!
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]That is all I have left for this month,
it would have been shame if we lost it.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]And you got the drinks. Let’s celebrate!
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]But now that you have the money back, go get those beers, will ya?
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]Haha, I guess using the money for couple of beers
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]I guess I just needed to treat myself for a change.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]Everything seems to roll the way she wants.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]She was unemployed like a week before she
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]Don’t give me that look, I’m not giving up.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]I’ve been thinking a lot, and I think
it’s okay to just chill for now.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]I'll get a job one day. The day is not today,
but it could already be tomorrow.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]I don’t think I asked you yet why you ended up on board.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]Man, you know you can’t avoid her forever.
\n<Thomas>\autoevent[4]She’ll be gone soon, and you’ll regret everything.
You sure you wanna take those?
